tutorial.speak:
In addition to the navigation options that are included automatically, you can manually add other options if desired.
To do this, log in, go to admin and choose Mobile.
On the right you will see a section for Tabs. Click the Plus icon to add a new one.
Select the type of page to include. In this example we'll include the Bible.
Change the text and image as desired. You will see a real-time preview of this navigation option on the mobile app.
And search for a suitable icon for use on the web version.
Click Save and your member portal and mobile app both will now include an easily accessible Bible tab.
The other tabs work the same way.
Select live stream to include a link to your live stream.
Or choose Verse of the Day.
External url will allow you to include any page on the web, including other platforms you may be using.
The final option is Page, which will show a new page you create. To create the page, click the plus icon in the Pages section.
You will use the webpage builder to add content to the page. See the Sections and Elements tutorial for doing so.
Once the page has been built you can add it to your navigation and it will be included.
